page.title: 17Life in Winston Today (ctd)
page.content: St.Andrew's also has a daughter church at Little Newsham which is open on the first Sunday of every month for evening worship. Tis church had to obtain a special marriage licence in 1981 when one of Little Newsham's residents was married there. In keeping with the strong non-conformist tradition in the area the village's other church is a Methodist Chapel. It comes under the Barnard Castle District and has no appointed minister of its own. Nevertheless is has a thriving congregation and runs the only Sunday School in the village, organising an annual Sunday School outing for the children. The concern that the villagers feel for preserving the peaceful nature of their village has recently been manifested in the strong objections to
